content.rendered:
• Veterans Crisis Line – 1-800-273-8255 (Press 1)
    • Confidential chat at VeteransCrisisLine.net or text 838255
    • Immediate confidential help for veterans and their families.  More information on programs at VeteransCrisisLine.net link above.
  • VA Benefits Info for Service Members Returning from Duty – www.oefoif.va.gov/
  • VA’s Vet Centers – www.vetcenter.va.gov/
    • Some local sites listed below.  Locate additional sites at link above.

San Bernardino Vet Center – San Bernardino Vet Center Website
1325 E. Cooley Drive, Ste. 101
Colton, CA 92324
909.801.5762

Corona Vet Center – Corona Vet Center Website
800 Magnolia Avenue, Suite 110
Corona, CA 92879
951.734.0525

North Orange County Vet Center – North Orange County Vet Website
12453 Lewis Street, Suite 101
Garden Grove, CA 92840
714.776.0161

High Desert Vet Center – High Desert Vet Center Website 
15095 Amargosa Road, Ste. 107
Victorville, CA 92393
760.261.5925

Ventura Vet Center – Ventura Vet Center Website 
790 East Santa Clara Avenue, Suite 100
Ventura, CA 93001
805.585.1860 o Ventura Vet Center

Main number: 805-585-1860
  • Long Beach Healthcare System (VA) – Long Beach Healthcare System Website
  • Greater LA Healthcare System (VA) – Greater LA Healthcare System Webpage 
  • Loma Linda Healthcare System (VA) – San Bernardino Healthcare System Webpage
  • Veterans Justice Outreach Program (VA) 
    • LA Veterans Court:  310-597-3495
    • Lancaster & Kern County Veterans Court:  310-709-8582
    • Santa Maria, Santa Barbara & San Luis Obispo Veterans Court:  301-916-4915
    • Ventura Veterans Court:  310-597-5016
  • War Veterans’ Combat Call Center: 877-927-8387
  • VA LGBT Special Emphasis Program – https://www.diversity.va.gov/programs/lgbt.aspx
    • Site is for both VA employees and veterans.  Vets, scroll down for info and contacts.
  • ACE (American Council on Education) – https://www.acenet.edu/higher-education/Pages/Military-Students-and-Veterans.aspx
    • Site for military and veteran students to access your JST (Joint Services Transcript) and other educational information.
  • Make The Connection (VA) – www.MakeTheConnection.net
    • Shared experiences, support and resources for veterans.
  • DAV (Disabled American Veterans) – https://www.dav.org/
    • Ensuring that veterans and their families can access the full range of benefits available to them.
    • Info on DAV transportation services  – DAV Need a Ride Link
  • Military OneSource – https://www.militaryonesource.mil/
    • Active Duty:  Understanding benefits, preparing for deployments, reintegration, moves, parenthood, retirement and more.
